CustomField.description: The cost of the Ticket Type will be used to calculate the Tax-deductible donation amount that displays to on the Attendees receipt if "Is Tax Deductible" is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The cost of the Ticket Type will be used to calculate the Tax-deductible donation amount that displays to on the Attendees receipt if "Is Tax Deductible" is checked.
CustomField.label: Cost
